# fxy-container



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute         | Description                                                                                                                                                                      | Type                                                                | Default                |
| --------------- | ----------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `fxyAlign`      | `fxy-align`       | Sets the `place-content` value for aligning content within the container. Accepts a combination of `justify-content` and `align-content` values. Example: "center space-around". | `string`                                                            | `"stretch flex-start"` |
| `fxyAlignItems` | `fxy-align-items` | Sets the align-items property of the container. Aligns items along the cross axis.                                                                                               | `"baseline" \| "center" \| "flex-end" \| "flex-start" \| "stretch"` | `'stretch'`            |
| `fxyDirection`  | `fxy-direction`   | Sets the flex-direction of the container.  Can be "row", "row-reverse", "column", or "column-reverse".                                                                           | `"column" \| "column-reverse" \| "row" \| "row-reverse"`            | `'row'`                |
| `fxyFill`       | `fxy-fill`        | If `true`, the container will fill its parent's height and width.                                                                                                                | `boolean`                                                           | `false`                |
| `fxyGap`        | `fxy-gap`         | Sets spacing between immediate child elements (`fxy-item`). The value is applied as a right margin to all children except the last one.                                          | `string`                                                            | `undefined`            |
| `fxyWrap`       | `fxy-wrap`        | Sets the flex-wrap property of the container. Can be "nowrap", "wrap", or "wrap-reverse".                                                                                        | `"" \| "nowrap" \| "wrap" \| "wrap-reverse"`                        | `''`                   |
